actionCalls.description: Calls an action to schedule a home visit with a Service Appointment ID equal to Home VisitId from CreateHomeVisit, using the scheduling policy that the user selected in SchedulingPolicyPicklist on CollectVisitDetailsScreen.
actionCalls.name: ScheduleHomeVisitManual
actionCalls.label: Schedule Home Visit

actionCalls.description: Calls an action to schedule a recurring home visit for the patient whose account record was passed into the flow, using user selections from CollectVisitDetailsScreen.
actionCalls.name: ScheduleRecurringVisit
actionCalls.label: Schedule Recurring Visit

assignments.name: SetApprovedVisitCountToZero
assignments.label: Set Approved Visit Count to Zero

assignments.description: Sets complex visit variables for the primary visit.
assignments.name: SetComplexVisitVariablesPrimaryVisit
assignments.label: Set Complex Visit Variables for Primary Visit

assignments.description: Sets complex visit variables for the secondary visit.
assignments.name: SetComplexVisitVariablesSecondaryVisit
assignments.label: Set Complex Visit Variables for Secondary Visit

assignments.description: Sets ServiceAppointmentForWorkOrderTemplateCount to the number of record IDs in the ServiceAppointmentsForWorkOrderTemplates collection.
assignments.name: SetServiceAppointmentWorkOrderRecurringVisitCount
assignments.label: Set Service Appointment Count

assignments.description: Sets ServiceAppointmentsForWorkOrderTemplateCount to the number of record IDs in the ServiceAppointmentsForWorkOrderTemplates collection.
assignments.name: SetServiceAppointmentWorkOrderTemplateCount
assignments.label: Set Service Appointment Count

assignments.description: Subtracts the CreatedVisitCount field of Care Service Visit Plan from GetCreatedVisitCount from the ApprovedVisitCount variable.
assignments.name: UpdateApprovedVisitCount
assignments.label: Update Approved Visit Count

constants.description: Stores the status value that indicates that a patient member's plan record is active. If your org uses something other than "Active" to denote the active status of a member plan, change the value of this constant before activating the flow.
constants.name: ActiveMemberPlanStatus

constants.description: Stores a Boolean value that indicates an authorization check is required to schedule home visits. To not require authorization before scheduling home healthcare visits, change this value to False. To dynamically determine whether authorization is required before scheduling a home healthcare visit, convert this constant into a Boolean variable that's available for input to the flow.
constants.name: AuthorizationCheckRequired

constants.description: Stores the name of the home health scheduling policy to use for the default value of SchedulingPolicyPicklist in CollectVisitDetailsScreen. To use a different home health scheduling policy as the default, change "Home Health Default Scheduling Policy" to the name of the home health scheduling policy to use as the default value of SchedulingPolicyPicklist in CollectVisitDetailsScreen.
constants.name: DefaultSchedulingPolicyName

constants.description: Stores the value for coverage type of home health visits. If your org uses something other than "Home Health" to denote home health visit coverage, change the value of this constant before activating the flow.
constants.name: HomeHealthCoverageType

constants.description: Stores the text to be used as the default value to indicate that the home visit source is a patient request.
constants.name: PatientRequestVisitSource

constants.description: Stores the care type text for a Start of Care visit. If your org uses something other than "StartOfCare" to denote a start of care type of visit, change the value of this constant before activating the flow.
constants.name: StartOfCareType

decisions.description: Determines whether to delete the service appointment records by checking if the Comment field of the record in the loop is set to the value of {formula variable name}.
decisions.name: DeleteServiceAppointmentTemplates
decisions.label: Delete Service Appointment Templates?

decisions.description: Determines whether more than 1 care professional is needed for the visit.
decisions.name: Have2CareResources
decisions.label: Have 2 Care Resources?

decisions.description: Determines whether the flow user set an end date and time for the visit to be scheduled.
decisions.name: HaveEndDateAndTime
decisions.label: Have End Date and Time?

decisions.description: Determines whether the reference ID of the home visit was passed into the flow by checking if the referenceId field in homeVisitDetails has a value.
decisions.name: HaveHomeVisitReferenceId
decisions.label: Have Home Visit Reference ID?

decisions.description: Determines whether the updated visit count in ApprovedVisitCount is negative.
decisions.name: IsApprovedVisitCountNegative
decisions.label: Is Approved Visit Count Negative

decisions.description: Determines whether the flow user selected Recurring Visit in VisitTypePicklist on CollectVisitDetailsScreen.
decisions.name: IsVisitRecurring
decisions.label: Is Visit Recurring?

decisions.description: Determines whether to delete the service appointment records by checking if the Comment field of the record in the loop is set to the value of ServiceAppointmentTemplateCommentCreatedDateRecurringVisitFormula.
decisions.name: ShouldDeleteServiceAppointmentTemplatesRecurringVisit
decisions.label: Should Delete Service Appointment Templates?

decisions.description: Determines whether to delete the work order records by checking if ServiceAppointmentForWorkOrderTemplateCount is equal to 0.
decisions.name: ShouldDeleteWorkOrdersStartOfCare
decisions.label: Should Delete Work Order Templates?

decisions.description: Determines whether to delete the work order records by checking if ServiceAppointmentForWorkOrderTemplateCount is equal to 0.
decisions.name: ShouldDeleteWorkOrderTemplatesRecurringVisit
decisions.label: Should Delete Work Order Templates?

decisions.description: Determines whether to update the count of the required visits by checking if source of homeVisitDetails matches PatientRequestVisitSource and DisableVisitsRequiredFieldFormula is False.
decisions.name: UpdateVisitsRequiredCount
decisions.label: Update Visits Required Count?

formulas.description: This formula isn't used in the flow. If you've removed the VisitRequired variable (also unused in the flow), you can remove this formula.
formulas.name: AuthVisitsValidation

formulas.description: Derives the service appointment template comment by combining the values of ServiceAppointmentTemplateCommentPrefix constant, {!$Flow.InterviewGuid}, and record created date.
formulas.name: ServiceAppointmentTemplateCommentCreatedDateFormula

formulas.description: Derives the service appointment template comment by combining the values of ServiceAppointmentTemplateCommentPrefix constant, {!$Flow.InterviewGuid}, and the record created date.
formulas.name: ServiceAppointmentTemplateCommentCreatedDateRecurringVisitFormula

formulas.description: Calculates whether the number of visits specified for the VisitsRequiredNumber field is valid. Returns true when AuthorizationRequiredCheckbox is selected, ApprovedVisitCount is greater than or equal to VisitRequiredNumber, and VisitRequiredNumber is greater than 0. Also returns true when AuthorziationRequiredCheckbox isn't selected and VisitRequiredNumber is greater than 0.
formulas.name: ValidateVisitsRequiredFormula
VisitRequiredErrorMessageFormula
formulas.expression: IF({!IsAuthorizationRequired}, IF(({!ApprovedVisitCount} > 0),"Select a number greater than 0 and less than or equal to " + TEXT({!ApprovedVisitCount}),""), IF({!ApprovedVisitCount}=0,"Select a number greater than 0",""))

loops.description: Repeats actions for each service appointment record in ServiceAppointmentTemplates.
loops.name: IterateOverServiceAppointmentTemplates
loops.label: Iterate Over Service AppointmentTemplates

loops.description: Repeats actions for each service appointment record in ServiceAppointmentTemplates.
loops.name: IterateOverServiceAppointmentTemplatesRecurringVisit
loops.label: Iterate Over Service Appointment Templates

loops.description: Repeats actions in a loop for each item in the workTypeIds collection.
loops.name: IterateOverWorkTypeIds
loops.label: Iterate Over Work Type IDs

loops.description: Repeats actions in a loop for each ID in selectedAdditionalSkillIds.
loops.name: IterateThroughAdditionalSkills
loops.label: Iterate Through Additional Skills

recordCreates.description: Creates a care service visit junction record, setting ServiceRequestId to selectedClinicalServiceRequestId, VisitId to Home VisitId from CreateHomeVisit, and VisitType to StartOfCareType. Stores the ID of the new record in Care Service VisitId from CreateCareServiceVisit. If your org uses something other than "StartOfCare" to denote a start of care type of visit, change the value of the StartOfCareType constant.
recordCreates.name: CreateCareServiceVisits
recordCreates.label: Create Care Service Visits

recordCreates.description: Creates a home visit record, setting DueDate to startVisitEndDateTime, EarliestStartTime to startVisitStartDateTime, ParentRecordId to Home Care ServiceId from CreateWorkOrder, WorkTypeId to selectedWorkTypeId, and address fields to related values from accountRecord. Stores the ID of the new record in Home VisitId from CreateHomeVisit.
recordCreates.name: CreateHomeVisit
recordCreates.label: Create Home Visit

recordCreates.description: Creates a skill requirement record, setting RelatedRecordId to the ID in Home Care ServiceID from CreateWorkOrder and SkillId to the current item in the loop.
recordCreates.name: CreateSkillRequirement
recordCreates.label: Create Skill Requirement

recordCreates.description: Creates a home care service record for the patients visit, setting AccountId to the ID of accountRecord passed into the flow, ServiceTerritoryId to the ID of the record that the user selected in RegionLookup on SelectVisitDetailsScreen, and WorkTypeId to selectedWorkTypeId. Stores the ID of the new record in the Home Care ServiceID from CreateWorkOrder variable.
recordCreates.name: CreateWorkOrder
recordCreates.label: Create Work Order

recordDeletes.description: Deletes the service appointment records with an ID matching the ServiceAppointmentTemplateId.
recordDeletes.name: DeleteServiceAppointmentTemplatesRcrVisit
recordDeletes.label: Delete Service Appointment Templates

recordDeletes.description: Deletes the service appointment records with an ID matching the ID of the current record in the IterateOverServiceAppointmentTemplatesRecurringVisit loop.
recordDeletes.name: DeleteServiceAppointmentTemplatesRecurringVisit
recordDeletes.label: Delete Service Appointment Templates

recordDeletes.description: Deletes the service appointment records with an ID matching the ID of the current record in the IterateOverServiceAppointmentTemplates loop.
recordDeletes.name: DeleteServiceAppointmentTemplatesStartOfCare
recordDeletes.label: Delete Service Appointment Templates

recordDeletes.description: Deletes the service appointment records with an ID matching the ServiceAppointmentTemplateId.
recordDeletes.name: DeleteServiceAppointmentTemplatesStartOfCareVisit
recordDeletes.label: Delete Service Appointment Templates

recordDeletes.description: Deletes the work order records with an ID matching WorkOrderTemplateId.
recordDeletes.name: DeleteWorkOrderTemplatesRcrVisit
recordDeletes.label: Delete Work Order Templates

recordDeletes.description: Deletes the work order records with an ID matching the Parent Record ID of the current record in the IterateOverServiceAppointmentTemplatesRecurringVisit loop.
recordDeletes.name: DeleteWorkOrderTemplatesRecurringVisit
recordDeletes.label: Delete Work Order Templates

recordDeletes.description: Deletes the work order records with an ID matching the Parent Record ID of the current record in the IterateOverServiceAppointmentTemplates loop.
recordDeletes.name: DeleteWorkOrderTemplatesStartOfCare
recordDeletes.label: Delete Work Order Templates

recordDeletes.description: Deletes the work order records with an ID matching WorkOrderTemplateId.
recordDeletes.name: DeleteWorkOrderTemplatesStartOfCareVisit
recordDeletes.label: Delete Work Order Templates

recordLookups.description: Gets the care request item with a ClinicalServiceRequestId that matches selectedClinicalServiceRequestId and stores the ApprovedQuantity field of the result in the ApprovedVisitCount variable.
recordLookups.name: GetCareRequestItem
recordLookups.label: Get Care Request Item

recordLookups.name: GetCoverageBenefits
recordLookups.label: $Label.ScheduleHomeVisitsFlow.GetCoverageBenefits
recordLookups.filterLogic: 1 AND 2 AND 3 AND (4 OR 6) AND (5 OR 7)

recordLookups.description: Gets the care service visit plan with a ServiceRequestId that matches the ID in clinicalServiceRequest and stores the ID and CreatedVisitCount fields of the result in the Care Service Visit Plan from GetCreatedVisitCount record variable.
recordLookups.name: GetNewClinicalServiceRequest
recordLookups.label: Get New Clinical Service Request

recordLookups.description: Gets the service appointment records with a Parent Record ID matching the Parent Record ID of the current record in the IterateOverServiceAppointmentTemplates loop. Stores the ID of results in the ServiceAppointmentsForWorkOrderTemplates record collection.
recordLookups.name: GetServiceAppointmentsWorkOrderTemplate
recordLookups.label: Get Service Appointments

recordLookups.description: Gets the service appointment records with an Account ID matching the Account ID of the record passed into the flow, Status equal to Canceled, and Comments contains ServiceAppointmentTemplateComment. Stores the results in the ServiceAppointmentTemplates record collection.
recordLookups.name: GetServiceAppointmentTemplatesRecurringVisit
recordLookups.label: Get Service Appointment Templates

recordLookups.description: Gets the service appointment records with an Account ID matching Account ID of the record passed into the flow, Status equal to Canceled, and Comments contains ServiceAppointmentTemplateComment. Stores the ID, CreatedDate, ParentRecordId, and Comments of the results in the ServiceAppointmentTemplates record collection.
recordLookups.name: GetServiceAppointmentTemplatesStartOfCare
recordLookups.label: Get Service Appointment Templates

recordLookups.description: Gets the service appointment records with a Parent Record ID matching the Parent Record ID of the current record in the IterateOverServiceAppointmentTemplatesRecurringVisit loop. Stores the ID of the results in the ServiceAppointmentsForWorkOrderTemplates record collection.
recordLookups.name: GetServiceAppointmentTemplatesWorkOrderRecurringVisit
recordLookups.label: Get Service Appointment Templates

recordLookups.description: Gets the service appointment record with an ID matching ServiceAppointmentTemplateId. Stores the parent record ID of the result in WorkOrderTemplateId.
recordLookups.name: GetServiceAppointmentTemplateWorkOrderRecurringVisit
recordLookups.label: Get Service Appointment Template

recordLookups.description: Gets the service appointment record with an ID matching ServiceAppointmentTemplateId. Stores the parent record ID of the result in WorkOrderTemplateId.
recordLookups.name: GetServiceAppointmentTemplateWorkOrderStartOfCare
recordLookups.label: Get Service Appointment Template

recordRollbacks.description: Undoes all record changes made after SelectVisitTimeStartCareScreen.
recordRollbacks.name: RollBackRecordsCareServiceVisit
recordRollbacks.label: $Label.ScheduleHomeVisitsFlow.RollBackRecordChanges

recordRollbacks.description: Undoes all record changes made after SelectVisitTimeStartCareScreen.
recordRollbacks.name: RollBackRecordsCreateSkillRequirement
recordRollbacks.label: $Label.ScheduleHomeVisitsFlow.RollBackRecordChanges

recordRollbacks.description: Undoes all record changes made after SelectVisitTimeStartCareScreen.
recordRollbacks.name: RollBackRecordsHomeVisit
recordRollbacks.label: $Label.ScheduleHomeVisitsFlow.RollBackRecordChanges

fields.name: getCarerequestItemErrMessage
fields.fieldText:
Something went wrong and we couldnt get the number of approved visits for this service request. Ask your Salesforce admin for help.


{!$Flow.FaultMessage}

fields.name: CareServiceVisitErrorDisplayText
fields.fieldText:
Something went wrong and we couldnt create the care service visit junction record. Ask your Salesforce admin for help.

{!$Flow.FaultMessage}

fields.name: ClinicalServiceRequestErrorDisplayText
fields.fieldText:
Something went wrong and we couldnt get the selected clinical service record. Ask your Salesforce admin for help.


{!$Flow.FaultMessage}

fields.name: CreateSkillRequirementErrorDisplayText
fields.fieldText:
Something went wrong and we couldnt get the skills required for the new home care service request. Ask your Salesforce admin for help.


{!$Flow.FaultMessage}

fields.name: HomeVisitErrorDisplayText
fields.fieldText:
Something went wrong and we couldn't create the home visit record. Ask your Salesforce admin for help.

{!$Flow.FaultMessage}

fields.name: ScheduleRecurringVisitScreenDisplayText
fields.fieldText: {!$Flow.FaultMessage}

fields.name: TimeslotErrorDisplayText
fields.fieldText: We cant schedule a visit time because the patients operating hours arent fully configured. Your Salesforce admin can help with that.

fields.name: WorkOrderErrorDisplayText
fields.fieldText:
Something went wrong, and we couldnt create a home care service record.

{!$Flow.FaultMessage}

fields.name: ScheduleStartOfCareVisitErrorDisplayText
fields.fieldText:
Something went wrong when we tried to schedule the start of care visit.

{!$Flow.FaultMessage}

variables.description: Store the number of approved visits available for the care request item associated with the selectedClinicalServiceRequestId.
variables.name: ApprovedVisitCount

variables.description: This variable isn't used in the flow and returns no value.
variables.name: assignedVisitCount

variables.description: This variable isn't used in the flow and returns no value.
variables.name: AuthorizationRefId

variables.description: Stores a collection of skill IDs that the first care resource is required to have.
variables.name: CareResource1SkillIds

variables.description: Stores a collection of skill IDs that the second care resource is required to have.
variables.name: CareResource2SkillIds

variables.description: Stores the record ID of the care service visit created by CreateCareServiceVisit and is available as output from the flow.
variables.name: careServiceVisitId

variables.description: Stores the record ID of the care service visit plan created by the ScheduleRecurringVisit action and is available as output from the flow.
variables.name: careServiceVisitPlanId

variables.description: Stores the ID of the clinical service request that the flow user selected in SelectSvcRequestAndSkillsComponent on CollectVisitDetailsScreen and is available as output from the flow.
variables.name: clinicalServiceRequest

variables.description: This variable isn't used in the flow and returns no value.
variables.name: CompletedVisitCount

variables.description: Stores a collection of skill record IDs for a care visit that has two care resources.
variables.name: ComplexVisitSkillIds

variables.description: This variable isn't used in the flow and returns no value.
variables.name: createCareServiceVisit

variables.description: Stores the default visit type of the home visit. The default value is set to StartOfCareVisitChoice.
variables.name: DefaultVisitType

variables.description: Stores a null date/time value.
variables.name: endDateNull

variables.description: Stores a collection of the additional skills that the user selected in SelectSvcRequestAndSkillsComponent on CollectVisitDetailsScreen. The collection doesn't include skills that are auto-selected based on the work type associated with the selected services request. This variable is available as output from the flow.
variables.name: filteredSkillList

variables.description: Stores an Apex heathcloudext__HomeVisitDetails record that contains the source and the reference ID of the home visit, and is passed into the flow.
variables.name: homeVisitDetails

variables.description: Indicates whether authorization is needed for the service to be provided
variables.name: IsAuthorizationRequired

variables.description: Stores a Boolean value that indicates whether the patient's coverage benefits and member plan are active and provide coverage for home healthcare visits.
variables.name: IsHomeVisitCoverageBenefitActive

variables.description: $Label.ScheduleHomeVisitsFlow.IsManualAssignmentForMultiResourcesDesc
variables.name: IsManualAssignmentForMultiResources

variables.description: This variable isn't used in the flow and returns no value.
variables.name: listOfSkills

variables.description: Stores the ID of the associated location record related to the account record passed into the flow.
variables.name: LocationId

variables.description: $Label.ScheduleHomeVisitsFlow.NullTextDesc
variables.name: NullText

variables.description: Stores the ID of the operating hours record to use when the patient visits are to be scheduled during available hours instead of a specific time.
variables.name: OperatingHoursId

variables.description: $Label.ScheduleHomeVisitsFlow.OperatingHoursSchedulingPreferenceDesc
variables.name: OperatingHoursSchedulingPreference

variables.description: Stores the account record of the patient to schedule home healthcare visits for and is passed into the flow.
variables.name: recordId

variables.description: Stores the frequency type for recurring visits that the flow user selected in SelectVisitRecurrenceFrequencyComponent on SelectVisitDetailsRecurringVisitScreen. Available as output from the flow.
variables.name: recurrenceType

variables.description: Stores a comma-delimited list of days the user selected to schedule recurring home visits in SelectVisitRecurrenceFrequencyComponent on SelectVisitDetailsRecurringVisitScreen. Available as output from the flow.
variables.name: recurrenceWeekDays

variables.description: Stores the record ID of a care service visit and is used to set RelatedVisitId for complex visits.
variables.name: RelatedVisitId

variables.description: Stores the related visit type for a complex visit.
variables.name: RelatedVisitType

variables.description: Stores the number of care resources needed for the scheduled visits.
variables.name: requriedCareResourcesCount

variables.description: $Label.ScheduleHomeVisitsFlow.resourceRecommendationDesc
variables.name: resourceRecommendation

variables.description: $Label.ScheduleHomeVisitsFlow.ResourceRecommendationCountDesc
variables.name: ResourceRecommendationCount

variables.description: Stores the scheduling preference type that the flow user selects for the home visit.
variables.name: SchedulingPreferenceType

variables.description: $Label.ScheduleHomeVisitsFlow.SelectedResourceRecommendationDesc
variables.name: SelectedResourceRecommendation

variables.description: Stores the count of record IDs in ServiceAppointmentsForWorkOrderTemplates.
variables.name: ServiceAppointmentForWorkOrderTemplateCount

variables.description: Stores the ID of service appointment records that are associated with a work order template.
variables.name: ServiceAppointmentsForWorkOrderTemplates

variables.description: $Label.ScheduleHomeVisitsFlow.ServiceAppointmentTemplateCommentDesc
variables.name: ServiceAppointmentTemplateComment

variables.description: $Label.ScheduleHomeVisitsFlow.ServiceAppointmentTemplateIdDesc
variables.name: ServiceAppointmentTemplateId

variables.description: Stores the ID, CreatedDate, ParentRecordId, and Comments of service appointment records.
variables.name: ServiceAppointmentTemplates

variables.description: Stores the ID of the services territory location record associated through LocationId to the account record that was passed into the flow.
variables.name: ServiceTerritoryId

variables.description: This variable isn't used in the flow and returns no value.
variables.name: skillRequirementRecord

variables.description: Stores a collection of all skills required for the visit and is available as output from the flow.
variables.name: skillsListId

variables.description: Stores the date and time to end a visit when the visit is to be scheduled for a specific time and is available for output.
variables.name: startDateEndTime

variables.description: Stores the date and time to start a visit when the visit is to be scheduled for a specific time and is available for output.
variables.name: startDateStartTime

variables.description: This variable isn't used in the flow and returns no value.
variables.name: unAssignedVisitCount

variables.description: This variable isn't used in the flow and returns no value.
variables.name: VisitRequired

variables.description: $Label.ScheduleHomeVisitsFlow.WorkOrderTemplateIdDesc
variables.name: WorkOrderTemplateId

variables.description: Stores the ID of the work type that the flow user selected in SelectSvcRequestAndSkillsComponent on CollectVisitDetailsScreen.
variables.name: workTypeId

variables.description: Stores a collection of work type record IDs associated with the clinical service request.
variables.name: WorkTypeIds

variables.description: $Label.ScheduleHomeVisitsFlow.WorkTypeNameDesc
variables.name: WorkTypeName
